descriptionHtml:
Thanks and Credits:
Voice:  Gideon Emery
Textures: Ellise, Urshi, Apachii 
Meshes: Ellise, Maymay, Apachii, Urshi, VectorPlexus.
Scripting: Urshi, Yourenotsupposedtobeinhere, Migal130.
Testing: Mymajestymv, Maymay, MissLexi,  Ellise, Yourenotsupposedtobeinhere, Apachii.

Special Thanks: Migal130,  Ashara, TheDNightShade, SydneyB, Mujuro, Emma, Anduniel , ShinglesCat and all the people who cared about this mod and helped with their advice and support.

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and Creation Kit.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file's description was based on.
Thanks to David Gaider and Bioware for creating Fenris character who was a huge inspiration for this mod. (No actual Bioware files were used in any way while creating the mod).
And last but not least many thanks to the Nexus Network, for providing and maintaining such a great place for modders to share their work.


Programs used:
Creation Kit
Nifskope
Tes5Edit
Audacity
Photoshop
Zbrush
3DSMax
Blender
FO3 Archive Utility
NotePad++
Readme generator

Tutorials used: [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/NightasyTutorials/playlists]Nightasy Tutorials[/url], [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_1]SydneyB tutorials[/url], [url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLACD7BBE7BB81BDC1]Doughamil CK tutorials[/url],  [url=http://deck16.net/post/22645519500/making-a-unique-voiced-follower-in-skyrim-part-1]Deck 16’s voiced follower tutorial[/url],

Additional credits are in the readme and in the credits tab of the mod!

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/853528]shrikebot[/url] for script sources
Requirements:
You should join the Empire in the Civil War quest line. If you've joined Stormcloaks the quest will not work for you.
You should complete Before the Storm quest from the main quest line.

Read the FAQ before posting. Comments asking questions that were already addressed in the FAQ will be deleted.

FAQ

Q: May I reupload your mod on steam/ any other site?
A: No. It's Nexus exclusive. If I wish it to be reuploaded to any other site, I am perfectly capable of doing it myself. Please respect my decision and don't reupload my mod elsewhere.

Q: Can I marry Fenris?
A: No, but you can flirt with him and hug him.

[size=2][b]Q: Can you remove flirt options?
[/b][/size]A: No, I am not going to do that. You have a freedom not to choose the flirt options though.

Q: Can you make other DA characters as followers?
A: Sorry, not interested.

Q: Can you make a version that doesn't require one to join the Empire?
A: I am not going to do that. All the comments with requests to circumvent the requirements in any way will be deleted.

Q: Will you make a patch for...
A: I do not make patches for other mods.
author: Urshi
